Mayor & Council

Elected Officials

Elected officials serve four-year terms, and the election for these positions are held in November during a General Election. The Mayor and Council serve four-year terms. There are four ward positions and two at-large positions. View the Ward Map (PDF) to see who your Council member is.

Your current Mayor and City Council members are:

  1. Taneea Browning

    Mayor
    Email Taneea Browning
    More Information

  1. Dr. Neil Olsen

    Council Member Ward I
